title: r/Entitledparents rSlash Has A Real Encounter With a Karen!
description:
r/Entitledparents Guess what guys... I HAD A REAL LIFE ENCOUNTER WITH A MALE KAREN! I had to go get a document notarized, and one of the customers had a mini freak out and was saying very inappropriate things to a minor who was working behind the counter with (I think) her dad or uncle. I couldn't believe what I was hearing! This guy was insane! If you like this video, subscribe for more daily Reddit content!

🔔 Subscribe: https://bit.ly/2E3A8i6
